title: ArtifactResolverConfig
description: Configuration for resolving AGI artifact references, including generators, template sources, and processor hooks.

templateRepositories.description: Maps logical template source identifiers to physical storage locations (e.g., Git URLs, local paths).

generatorDefinitions.description: Maps generator IDs (used in ArtifactStructuralDefinition.pipeline.generatorReference) to executable modules/classes.

modulePath.description: Internal path to the AGI module responsible for generation.

defaultTemplateRepoId.description: ID of the primary template repository this generator uses.

hookDefinitions.description: Maps hook function references (used in ArtifactStructuralDefinition.pipeline.hooks) to specific execution endpoints.
